work.summary: Maintain and enhance Tesla web services as part of the Connected Systems team.
highlights: Responsible for migrating internal facing tool to a single page application using unified JavaScript dependencies.
Responsible for upgrading the internal role and policies management application to Tesla corporate design using React components.

work.summary: Maintain and enhance National Bank mobile banking application.
highlights: Design and develop mobile applications frontend features using HTML5, Less and Javascript (AngularJS & Apache Cordova).
Develop backend adapters in Java and Javascript using IBM Worklight platform.
Actively participate in the business needs analysis and the implementation of new application functionality in a progressive manner using agile methodologies.
Promote collaborative culture while contributing to the first IT internal hackathon.

work.summary: Build more than 50 custom websites including several online shops, transactional and corporate websites.
highlights: Implement a contest management platform used across Quebec that generated hundreds of thousands of coupons being printed and distributed for multiple contests.
Provide a secure administration platform for the client to analyze contests results.
Create multiple modules for in-house CMS platforms and integrate them within the frontend layer.
Design, create, manage and optimize MySQL databases.

work.summary: Participate in the development of multiple websites using jQuery and PHP.

education.area: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
